opinion.posture: Petition for post-conviction relief. Before DOTY, J. Appeal, No. 223, Oct. T., 1971, from order of Court of Common Pleas, Trial Division, of Philadelphia, June T., 1968, No. 368. Submitted September 13, 1971.
opinion.attorneys: Stanley M. Schwarz, for appellant; Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorney, JamesD. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Richard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
